ygData.subject: RE: NPCs selling lambent stones (was Lambent Stones on  E'ci)5
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A) define special. B) Suggestion noted ;) Talies the Designer
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:24 PM 12/9/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Thu, 9 Dec 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
> >
> > it shows the older items. my friend accidentally sold his mortificator
> > staff to an npc. this is the only one we know of on our server, he got it
> > in a GM event. i did not hear until about a week later, and he was still
> > upset about it. i told him i heard if you go buy all of the items from the
>
>Yes, important lesson to anyone designing these types of
>games: Give special items DIFFERENT graphics than normal
>items. I gave away my crystalline blade while handing out
>fine steel loot. I also sold an ebony blade to a merchant.


A) define special.
B) Suggestion noted ;)

Talies the Designer
